page.title: 19HOME LIFE
page.content: A survey was made by the children in the school to find out the kinds of things people do in the home. JOBS ABOUT THE HOME Mothers did most of the housework-type jobs although many fathers helped.Most children had to do jobs like washing-up,shopping and gardening. ENTERTAINMENT Most popular was T.V,.listening to pop music and in some homes D.I.Y. INTERESTS AND HOBBIES Many boys were in scout groups and the men said they enjoyed gardening, D.I.Y. and playing or watching football.Mothers did sewing and knitting whilst some went to Keep Fit. Very few read newspapers or visited museums,art galleries or libraries.
